casebody.data:
LISA CHARETTE v. HARTFORD LIFE AND ACCIDENT INSURANCE COMPANY (SC 17571)

Sullivan, C. J., and Borden, Norcott, Katz and Zarella, Js.

Argued February 8 officially released March 14, 2006 *425Robert A. Serafinowicz, with whom, on the brief, was John R. Williams, for the appellant (plaintiff). Michael G. Durham, with whom, on the brief, was Brock T. Dubin, for the appellee (defendant).

Opinion

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
